notes: USA-based supplier of sugarcane-derived squalane for clean beauty and sustainable skincare brands. Applications: Restores skin hydration (5-20%), hair care (2-5%), silky non-greasy feel. Bio-based material naturally occurring in skin lipids with biomimetic properties. Mid-range pricing ($55-80/kg) with flexible quantities and testing samples available. Bio-based and sustainable certifications. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Product specifications and application guidance provided. Ideal for eco-conscious brands prioritizing sustainability.
